column4: I need help on how to set up my WiFI router. The network-admin tool shows it but doesn't activate it. and I at least need to see all of the wifi networks. Please help!?
steps i do to connect to a open AP: sudo ifconfig ath0 up  then  iwlist ath0 scan  then sudo iwconfig ath0 essid whatevername   then dhclient ath0   your card maybe wlan0 or eth1 or whatever
